IACP Follow Up Reshaping Your Future
We are honored to have spent time with you at IACP!
Conferences are a busy week and we greatly appreciate your visit with TriTech at the recent IACP Conference in Chicago.
With no end in sight to economic restrictions amidst continued demand for service, agencies have to reshape the way they manage information and conduct operations. We’re providing flexible solutions and proposing new models of operating to help clients reshape the way they manage information to help them focus on what’s important – ensuring public safety.
We encourage you to take a closer look at how we're helping our clients reshape their future.
Congratulations! Captain Jonathan Pardo of Madison Police Department in Connecticut is the lucky winner of iPad 2 drawing at IACP.
